text:
Lyric | www.staylyric.com | San Francisco, CA | Full Time | Onsite

Lyric's Creative Suites are your launchpad to a better travel experience, combining the spaciousness of an apartment, the amenities of a 4-star hotel, the productivity of your favorite work space, and the creative surroundings of an artistic studio.

Funding: https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/lyric#section-invest.... Wall Street Journal: https://t.co/u67lZFqawf Why NEA & NFX Invested: https://youtu.be/HyrjgDfwzAs
